title: CyberLink PowerDirector Ultimate v14.0.2019.0  Retail Content
description:
CyberLink PowerDirector Ultimate v14.0.2019.0
                 Incl.Retail Content Packs-d33p57a7u5
        ---------------------------------------------------------
                                (CORE)

    URL.: http://www.cyberlink.com/products/powerdirector-ultimate/


 PowerDirector 14 introduces extreme video editing, pushing beyond
 traditional video making boundaries to offer something truly new
 - a unique combination of the high-end performance and features
 found in pro-level software, wrapped in the easy-to-use, intuitive
 design of consumer products making it accessible to everyone from
 complete beginners through to expert video editors.


 Operating System:
 - Microsoft Windows 10, 8/8.1, 7, Vista (SP2)

 What's new in CyberLink PowerDirector Ultimate 14:
 - Screen Recorder (New)
 - TrueVelocity 5 Engine (New)
 - Native 64-bit TrueVelocity 5 Engine (New)
 - Latest Format and Codec Support (Enhanced)
 - Import/Export High Frame Rate Video (New)
 - Action Camera Center (New)
 - Motion Tracking (New)
 - Import, Edit and Export High Frame Rate Video (New)

 Retail Content Packs Included:
 - CyberLink Holiday Pack Vol.6
 - CyberLink Travel Pack
 - CyberLink Wedding Pack
 - PowerDirector 14 Content Pack Essential
 - PowerDirector 14 Content Pack Premium 1


  [INSTALLATION]



     Uninstall all previous versions, including all leftovers.

     Please note, If you have previously installed Cyberlink
      you may have to delete the following directories:

     C:ProgramDataCyberLink
     C:UsersXXXXXAppDataLocalCyberLink
     C:UsersXXXXXAppDataRoamingCyberLink
     where XXXXX is your user name as well as these registry keys:
     HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWARECyberLink HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWARE
     Wow6432NodeCyberLink for x64 bit OS.

     Please pay attention! The most important thing to remember:

     - The serial you generated from CORE keygen must be the same
     you place in Custom.ini in the main setup directory of PDIR14!!!
     Otherwise you can't activate it manually.

   - Normally I've already generated one serial from CORE keygen
   and inserted it in Custom.ini in the main directory of PDIR14.
   That serial you place in Custom.ini and the one you will use
   for activation has to be the same! You have the following options:

   A) - Don't edit Custom.ini in PDIR14 Retail Setup folder.
      Just open it copy CD key into CORE keygen serial part.
   B) - Or, Generate your personal serial from keygen and paste it on
      Custom.ini in the main directory of PDIR14 (MyCDKey part)
      and save it. Don't close the keygen, you will use the same
      serial when manual activation prompted.

    - Install PDIR14.

    - After install, do not open it.

    - Go to registry and edit the following path: (Run regedit.exe)

      Edit PD14  --->
      UserReg --->  
      Product Activate -->
      Change to LocalServer -->
      Save .

      HKLMSOFTWARECyberlinkPowerDirectorUserreg

      Change Prod_activate from OnlineCheck to LocalServer

      - After you're done installing. Open PDIR14:

      - Now import a MKV to get manual activation.
      When prompted, remember the serial you place in Custom.ini
      in the main directory of DS4.
      Paste it into manual activation dialog.

      - From keygen click on "Get Activation Code".
      After activation code generated copy it back to activation dialog.
      This way codecs will be enabled.

      - Same activation stands for other apps in the Suite as well.
      CD, AD, PD will not require anything to activate.

      More info on how to perform manual activation:

      - Run Power Director --->
      Import any .mkv file to initiate the activation dialog.

      - Click "I don't have an interent connection now.

      - In the activation dialog click the link and then copy it
      before it changes in your browser's address bar.
      It should look like this:
  http://www.cyberlink.com/cae/2581/powerdirector/activation?id=5b16adcd-008

     - Now paste that link into the keygen and hit 'gen activation.
     Paste that code into the dialog

     - In the keygen click "Add Online Activation"



                â€¢ Thats it! Done.

                   â€¢ Supp0rt th3 D3v3lop3r if you liK3 it.

                                                    â€¢ 3Nj0Y!!!
